greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields sequence A001065 (sum of proper divisors) + A063524 (1, 0, 0, 0, ...).
comment: The first negative term is a(360) = -12947.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A001065(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2018
